Arksiane 08-Jun-20 07:57 AM
Interview excerpt from the Daily Creaturas published book "Into Thuzland" R = Refugee I = Interviewer [General talks about thuzi authorities and the escape plan,full version of interview can be read in the real book] I: So what was your escape like? I must imagine it was quite traumatic. R: It was scary, if anything. I didnt feel much at that point because I really thought I would die. The Thuzi police were about to catch me when i made it to the refugee boat and I almost didnt even get on it. Throughout I just felt numb and I was thinking "Now you're going to get arrested and tortured. I: The thing i dont understand though, is why no one joined you. R: Obviously I tried, but most people think that there is no escape from the Thuzis. The administration never reports on successful attempts,and we have too many failed ones for most to even consider. I: What do you think will happen to people who are close to you? R: I dont know. You dont know if the people at home will die or live. You dont know what their reaction will be, if they will support you ot denounce you as a traitor. For all I know,my family could be dead, or they could be tortured for information on me,or they could be in a labor camp, or-or a million other things could happen. I-I dont know what hapened to them. [The interview stopped at this point,due to loss of composure from the refugee] (edited)

parm 18-Jun-20 06:42 PM
The People's Tribunal - Miller: I will remain an ardent supporter of the PIP during its corruption talks Written by Sam Jensen on 2020/6/17 As many of you many know, Sen. Fair of the PIP has recently been caught in a corruption scandal involving a few companies related to Ctn. Miller. In response, Miller has held talks at New Porto today. We have sent our crew with Comrade Steve Johnson as reporter out to the press talks. Miller has worryingly not taken a stance on the PIP's major corruption problem, saying that "That’s up to the party to decide, but I will work with them as an ardent supporter," while one of their members is under investigation for corruption. Update: Miller has recently taken a stance in favor of Fair's expulsion from the PIP in the form of a tweet, in response to our article. He was also asked about economic imperialism in Patrium and has stated "I’d like to avoid Patrium being torn up by the US and China," despite having both investors linked to Beijing and Wall Street himself. He has also spoke out against nationalization and co-operativization preferring to keep dictatorial control over his company which supposedly "treats its workers well" and because he "built it from the ground up," despite him profiting off of his workers' surplus labor. After that he accused our reporter and comrade Steve Johnson of saying something which we weren't able to verify or confirm. In summary, Miller has refused to take a stance in the PIP corruption scandal and opposes handing his company to the workers. (edited)

character-confusion 18-Jun-20 08:49 PM
The Proletarian Guard (colloquially known as Tankie News Network) Today, we have seen the terrifying failures of both capitalism and libertarianism as they infest our government and destroy our country. The Peace and Independence Party's very own Senator Leslie Margaret Fair has been found participating in corrupt collusion and insider trading. Following an attempt by the National Labor Front to improve and industrialize our country through the nationalization of one of our foremost construction companies, Miller Inc., the senator attempted to make a backroom deal with the company's head to undermine the bill's passage. We also saw a leak of information from an anonymous source informing the public that the United States of America was attempting to use its investments in Patrian companies in order to influence our politics. Carlyle Lassiter, an American businessman notorious for the unethical practices he exports to the rest of the world, encouraged this deal, pushing Miller and Fair into sabotaging our democracy. While this economic imperialism is of course common practice for America, we should be horrified that it happened right here in Patrium. This, my Patrian comrades, is the sort of corruption that happens when we let capitalists into our government. They care nothing for us, only for themselves and their own profit. We must stand strong, and stand united, and stamp out the threat they pose to our glorious country.
========================================================================
Breaking news! Senator Leslie Margaret Fair found dead. https://discordapp.com/channels/705637850967834665/717477556881850378/723383710728192063
parm 18-Jun-20 08:57 PM
@Leslie Margaret Fair committed suicide. There was a note by the gun she had used to end her life, alongside tons of empty beer and whiskey bottles. she was dressed in a cowgirl outfit, with blood splattering the inside of the stetson. "I'm so sorry... to all of you, my employees, my fellow senators, and my only freind, Mr.McCurtney. I just cant take this anymore. All this publicity, all this pressure, all these people relying on me. I cant keep going on like this, walking a wire every single damn day, fearing for everyone that I serve, fearing that I could make the people i serve worse off. I just wanted to make patrium a better place. I wanted to make the future for my employees a bright one, and i just wanted to make things better. So many people look up to me. And i have failed them all. My employees now need to fear for their jobs, Mr. Miller has to worry about his whole buisness going aground, not a single proposition has gone through, our company is tanking. I want everyone to know that Timothy had nothing to do with this. I dont think he even knew until those papers came out. Tim, if you read this, I loved you. i always have. ever since we first met in that ugly alleyway i was in love with you, your kind eyes, your gentle touch, your warm embrace... now i have hurt you too and i cant stand myself for it. I broke my agreement with my people, and now... now everyone is losing everything because of me... I wanted to make things better, but i only made things worse, and i cant live with myself for that. I wanted to die fighting, in a sort of glorious exit. Ironic isnt it? The person who could fight the most for others, cant even fight for herself. Timothy had nothing to do with what i did. neither did any of the members of PIP. so please, dont blame them for anything i did. it was all me, and only me."

The Proletarian Guard (colloquially known as Tankie News Network) We are hearing reports that the replacement for the recently deceased corrupt senator Leslie Margaret Fair, COO of McCurtney Glassware, is to be replaced by the same company's CEO, Timothy McCurtney. This, comrades, is capitalist corruption if I've ever seen it. We are now to have the CEO of a major corporation serving in our government, furthering his own interests and sullying the senate with his capitalist agenda. Not to mention that he is closely connected to a senator known to be guilty of corruption and collusion. This should worry every single Patrian citizen; if you care about our democracy, if you care about our working class, if you care about our country, you should must oppose McCurtney's election.

someguyinshorts 18-Jun-20 10:45 PM
Part 1, Controversial Senator commit Suicide? Hello everyone welcome to the show KnowStrug also known and the Emrick show, I’m Owen Emrick and let’s delve right into the news. So it appears senator “Leslie Fair” just commit suicide after a big controversy surrounding her. Now, is this a tragedy even as he was a danmed globalist capitalist boughua as he lived? Yes, but some things caught my eye when I read the official report from the police, some thing caught me as a little off. Now these are actual reports so don’t act like I’m not delivering the truth. Now according to the report, Fair shot himself, based off that report, it was most likely through the mouth, we have no pictures but it did talk about blood inside the cowboy hat, the stetson, you don’t get blood inside the hat without a hole in the hat and you wouldn’t make one aiming at your temple, and there was a note next to the gun. Now, with this knowledge and interaction we can is why this is odd. When you shoot yourself in the mouth, your holding the note in your other hand, or it’s laying on the ground, your gonna slouch over, most likely on a way where there is separation between the gun and the note, most like let the gun will fall out with a little drag on the shooting arm, the opposite of the hand your holding the note. So, in a normal scenario, unless he fell in a way that caused the gun and note to naturally fall together, which would be unlikely. Another, more unlikely scenario would be either holding both the note and the gun in the same hand, or at least holding the note close to her face, which I don’t think woulda happened, why would you hold your note so high up when you could just set it down or relax that hand while still holding it, it makes know sense. Now the final idea is she put the not down before firing away, now the way the body would fall would be leaning towards the arm that fires the gun if your on a wall or straight back if your in the middle of the room because of the recoil.
Part 2, Controversial Senator commits suicide? With that in mind, she would have to awkwardly put the note down in a strange position before hand for the gun to fall in one of the many ways it could and hope it falls that way, and this is all assuming she wants the note next to the gun, there’s no good reason to do so, the note would’ve been found anywhere else, plus it’s not like she woulda thought of that while preparing to BLOW HER BRAINS OUT, it’s real odd. Another thing that bugs me is the follow up, who took her place and such. When he died, now right now we’re getting into rumors but theirs a possibility it’s true, expect a follow up, that CEO McCurtney will take her place in the senate. Now, first of all, why is a supposed elected position, like a position on senate should be, being given away, and to a CEO no doubt! The CEO isn’t a politician, at least in the traditional sense, and he isn’t elected, he probably couldn’t EVEN BE ELECTED under normal circumstances, you know how popular CEOs are, you’ve seen the Bloomberg campaign. And you know, I believe I know what their trying to do, it’s what they’ve always been doing. They killed her and staged it as a suicide, and a convincing one at that, because she was a danmed liability due to the controversy and had to be replaced, and god save anyone the globalist cappy world order finds a liability. THEY DID IT TO EPSTEIN, THEY DID IT TO HALF THE DANM PEOPLE THAT WORKED FOR THE CLINTONS, AND THEY DID IT TO HER. I WILL TELL YOU NOW AND I WILL TELL YOU ONCE AGAIN, THE NEW WORLD ORDER OF GLOBALISTS MUST BE STOPPED, OR MORE WILL BE SILENCED DAMMIT. Sigh, well that’s the story as I see it, I will follow it as it develops and if information comes out proving I’m wrong, I’ll correct myself. But hey, that’s the struggle to bring knowledge to the workers. Thank you for tuning in have a wonderful day and thank the Proletarian Guard for letting me broadcast the show, have a wonderful day, take care.

parm 19-Jun-20 09:16 AM
The People's Tribunal - Op-ed: We mustn't let the death of Sen. Fair forgive her actions and those of the PIP Written by Sen. Mega [New Porto - AFL] on 2020/6/19 If you are feeling suicidal thoughts or are attempting suicide, please call the Suicide Hotline immediately at +69 (420) SEX-MONKE My heart goes out to Sen. Fair, her family, and her loved ones; nobody should commit suicide over politics. However, I have no kind words for those who use her suicide to push her agenda and turn her into a sort of martyr. As harsh as it may seem, we cannot use her death to forget about her trying to sell Patrium out to imperialist investors and her corrupt conduct. That is simply too dangerous and that's what the large corporations and multibillionaire investors want you to do. While we cannot excuse the PIP in not taking quicker action, especially when Sen. Fair has had similar motives before, the most damning action they have done is the acceptance of Ctn. Timothy McCurtney, the main candidate in the race to fill Sen. Fair's seat and presumed lover & associate of Fair. As we all remember, the scandal was linked to McCurtney Glasswares as well, where McCurtney is CEO and Fair was COO. Accepting an associate of a disgraced former senator and a participant in the scandal which lead to all of this is frankly insane. The PIP is a corrupt institution beyond repair, and all members of the PIP who still hold some ethical values should leave the PIP immediately. I also am calling for the immediate withdrawal of the AFL from Liberty Coalition, which includes PIP, until the corruption problems and scandals have been repaired and the people's trust has been restored. (edited)

Dr. Kris Lawrence 19-Jun-20 10:20 AM
The Voice of Liberty - Senator Fair's death, an assassination in disguise Author has asked to remain anonymous 2020/6/19 First thing first, my heart goes to Senator Fair, her family and her colleagues, both at PIP as well as at McCurtney Glassworks. No one should take their own life in any circumstances, especially in politics. We have received some insider information from a trusted source that wants to remain anonymous of new evidence in the investigation of the supposed suicide of Senator Leslie Margaret Fair. According to our source, the investigation team had discovered a pin in the table next to where Senator Fair laid. Upon closer inspection, the team discovered that the pin is one of the NLF logo. Moreover, it is known that the neighbors of Senator Fair are high up NLF supporters. They are the one who called in the "suicide" of her. Moreover, their fingerprints are on the door of Senator Fair's apartment, which was already unlocked when the body of her was first discovered. We won't go into any conclusions at this, but it is possible that Senator Fair's death isn't suicide, but an assassination by NLF sympathizers. We will keep you updated on any new leaks on this situation.

Deleted User 19-Jun-20 10:31 AM
The St. Solomon Daily Addressing the NLF Rumors Inspector William R. Lorccan In regards to the latest article from the Voice of Liberty. We were waiting for more facts to release this, but now that this info has escaped my team and I figured now is the best time to release this info. First of all, yes, there was an NLF pin left at the crime scene next to a stack of papers laying next to the late senator's corpse. Second, again, yes, Senator Fair’s neighbors, are ardent NLF supporters, though they did call in the apparent suicide after hearing a gunshot in the area and did some sleuthing of their own. The fingerprints on the door handle may be explained by this, and the unlocked door as well. But, these neighbors were not at the crime scene when the police arrived and they are currently in police custody. We are investigating these neighbors' ties to a reported NLF paramilitary group formed in the midst of the Farmers Rebellion. Thus, everything the article said was technically true, and we have not closed the case on this being a possible murder. More updates will come soon, but my team insisted I put out this warning… Any senator who is a supporter of the PIP bill, please stay safe, we don’t want the worse to come to you.

someguyinshorts 19-Jun-20 11:00 AM
Part 3, Controversial Senator commits suicide? Hello everyone this is Owen Emrick white KnowStrug, and I’m here to voice my concerns about the latest news that has came out. Now, while all the facts presented are true, something strikes me as odd. If I, an NLF supporter, we’re to kill a political enemy, why would I place a pin of my party at the scene of the crime? There’s no good reason to do it, if it was where it was placed it was most likely put their on purpose, it would only put the blame on you and your party. Any attempt at framing someone else, if that’s your goal, goes out the window, and with a narrower chance of being caught go up. You would only gain some intimidation factor, a reputation, but with all the downsides of being know as “that party with the killer in it”, it still wouldn’t be worth it. If it was dropped accidentally, a pin fell off it still doesn’t make sense! Why would you wear a pin of your party to a killing if not to leave it there, it would serve no purpose except identification, something you would not want in a homicide. And if your gonna bring a party pin, why not gloves? Why would you just put your fingerprints all over the crime scene if you were gonna commit a serious crime. It’s as if the culprit WANTED to be caught. Plus, beside finger prints on the door, we are yet to get any fingerprint data on the rest of the room, so we don’t know if the NLF neighbors went inside. This whole new batch of evidence wreaks of more foul play than round one. The prints, in my opinion, came from hearing a gunshot in your neighborhood, it’s not a ghetto it’s not common sound to hear a gunshot, run out to investigate and find your neighbor dead. Even if your neighbor was a political enemy some form of casual relationship ought to be there, they wouldn’t like looking at a dead friend, they called the cops and got out so they didn’t have to see her corpse. And the pin, well it’s a really danm simple answer, one I’m sure we’re all familiar with.
THESE GLOBALIST CAPPY BASTARDS WANTED TO FRAME THE “SUICIDE” ON THEIR ENEMY!!! ITS A CLEVER RUSE TO MAKE THINGS LOOK BAD ON OUR PART, DANM THESE EVIL MURDEROUS SHADOW-GOVERNMENT WANTING MEN TO HELL!!! sigh I will tell you this, whoever to blame for the supposed suicide for Leslie Fair, it ain’t the NLF, the evidence points to it all being a framing. The pin would be easy to get, it’s not like their exclusive keepsakes, and having ideologically opposed neighbors would be a good cover, but they the truth is out there, you just need to find it. When more evidence comes to light, I will continue bringing my struggle to bring knowledge to the proletariat. Thank you for tuning in and thank the Proletarian Guard for letting me broadcast the show, have a wonderful day, take care.

SatiristicWretch 19-Jun-20 12:17 PM
The Rare Steak: Always Pragmatic Leslie: A simple suicide, or Epstein 2.0? The circumstances of Senator Leslie's death have been quite convenient. Isn't it convenient that her death happened right when McCurtney Glassware was under suspicion of corruption? Isn't it convenient that the person next in line to Leslie is the CEO of the company itself? So that Leslie's soul may rest in peace, heavy investigation must occur, such that there is not a shred of doubt regarding th circumstances of Leslie's death, and I truly believe, that her family, who as of now is in mourning, would want justice to be done. First, the facts:
-An investigation launched regarding Leslie and possible association with McCurtney Glassware for usingprivate funds to circumvent government decisions -The next morning she could be found in her aparrtment. She had apparently committed suicide. There was a note by the gun she had used to end her life, alongside tons of empty beer and whiskey bottles. She was dressed in a cowgirl outfit, with blood splattering the inside of the stetson. "I'm so sorry... to all of you, my employees, my fellow senators, and my only freind, Mr.McCurtney. I just cant take this anymore. All this publicity, all this pressure, all these people relying on me. I cant keep going on like this, walking a wire every single damn day, fearing for everyone that I serve, fearing that I could make the people i serve worse off. I just wanted to make patrium a better place. I wanted to make the future for my employees a bright one, and i just wanted to make things better. So many people look up to me. And i have failed them all. My employees now need to fear for their jobs, Mr. Miller has to worry about his whole buisness going aground, not a single proposition has gone through, our company is tanking. I want everyone to know that Timothy had nothing to do with this. I dont think he even knew until those papers came out. Tim, if you read this, I loved you. i always have. ever since we first met in that ugly alleyway i was in love with you, your kind eyes, your gentle touch, your warm embrace... now i have hurt you too and i cant stand myself for it. I broke my agreement with my people, and now... now everyone is losing everything because of me... I wanted to make things better, but i only made things worse, and i cant live with myself for that.
I wanted to die fighting, in a sort of glorious exit. Ironic isnt it? The person who could fight the most for others, cant even fight for herself. Timothy had nothing to do with what i did. neither did any of the members of PIP. so please, dont blame them for anything i did. it was all me, and only me." I suppose i should take the advice of a freind, and take a break." -Senator Fair’s neighbors, are ardent NLF supporters, though they did call in the apparent suicide after hearing a gunshot in the area and did some sleuthing of their own. The fingerprints on the door handle may be explained by this, and the unlocked door as well. But, these neighbors were not at the crime scene when the police arrived and they are currently in police custody. -The investigation team had discovered a pin in the table next to where Senator Fair laid. Upon closer inspection, the team discovered that the pin is one of the NLF logo. Moreover, it is known that the neighbors of Senator Fair are high up NLF supporters.
Emerging theories: - It was a suicide: Proposed by the media first, with Senator Orion Rigel promoting it (due to there being specific information that they say only they and Leslie knew). - McCurtney did it: Proposed by Senator Shortsguy first, with senators such as Senator Satiristic promoting it (due to the circumstances under which the death occured, benefitting McCurtney, with investigation of his company being suspended, and he being next in line to Leslie) - The neighbours are a bunch of hoodlums I tell ya!: Proposed by Senator Chara Lawrence, recent development, so hasn't gained much traction (due to the pin being found on the table) - What if, it was a suicide made to look by a sloppy murder? : Proposed as a passing remark by Senator Satiristic, contemplated by Senator Shortsguy (due to there being almost too much """evidence""" trying to "pin" (hehe) the NLF) (edited)
The one I support: -McCurtney did it Why so? a) It's too suspicious to be a suicide. You tell me, in what way can one shoot themselves while also leaving a note by the gun they used? b) The NLF has no reason to co-ordinate the attack, Leslie was already being investigated, why jeopardise their own status? c) The 4th theory has some substance to it, but would still require unprecedented co-incidence/too much effort, and it still implicates the person who did so if the truth is found out d) Isn't too convenient how much McCurtney benefitted from Leslie's death? The investigation got suspended, and he gets to be senator? What's more, I can say that there is some very convincing information I have found out, which I, as a law abiding citizen, have submitted to the appropriate authorities. The information shall only be disclosed at the police's discretion. ~Anonymous (edited)

parm 19-Jun-20 12:32 PM
The People's Tribunal - BREAKING NEWS: NLF accused of assassinating Fmr. Sen. Fair Written by Sara Meyers on 2020/6/19 Recent bombshell accusations have been made in the light of Sen. Fair's death; initially thought to be a suicide, damning evidence has came out putting the NLF in the spotlight as the potential murderers of Sen. Fair. Inspector William Lorccan has published an article in The St. Solomon Daily that states "there was an NLF pin left at the crime scene next to a stack of papers laying next to the late senator's corpse," and "Senator Fair’s neighbors are ardent NLF supporters." This is damning against the NLF, whose authoritarian beliefs and practices sometimes lead to violence against their enemies. Even more damning are "these neighbors' ties to a reported NLF paramilitary group formed in the midst of the Farmers Rebellion." The case is currently being investigated as a murder, reversing the previous judgement of it being a suicide. However, there has been opposition to this view. Ctn. Owen Emrick on KnowStrung, a show on The Proletarian Guard which is the propaganda network of the NLF, claims that this is a framing against NLF by "capitalists," despite everyone within the vicinity having links to NLF paramilitaries. However, KnowStrung is a highly biased source for information regarding the NLF. We here say that the evidence points to an NLF assassination but we won't rule out a framing or suicide. In addition, there is also a significant possibility that Ctn. McCurtney was linked to the death. LIBERTAS, EQVITAS, VERITAS

Senator Evans 19-Jun-20 01:50 PM
New Porto Times: Who was really responsible for the death of Leslie Fair? After the alleged “suicide” of Leslie Fair various different theories around her death have emerged, but they all leave out a critical detail. This detail is the mysterious involvement of American businessmen Carlyle Lassiter. Anonymous sources from within Miller Co. have alleged that this American pushed Miller to sell his company to McCurtney Glassware as part of a corrupt backroom deal with Leslie Fair. It also alleges that Mr. Lassiter and a multitude of American investors were heavily involved in the corruption and insider trading that eventually led to Leslie’s supposed suicide. Mr. Lassiter has an extensive period of engaging in corruption. His corrupt subversion of safety standards in Malaysia resulted in a deadly fire at a factory he invested in, his dealings in Latin America helped spark a Cartel war and now it appears that his dealings in Patrium have caused the suicide of a Senator. It also happens that Mr. Lassiter worked for a time as a contractor for the United States government. It is evident that Mr. Lassiter, American investors and possibly the American government have had their hands all over this scandal. It is likely that they were behind this, and that the other theories have just been attempts to deflect blame. This is more proof as to why American investors, businessmen and government officials cannot be trusted. Patrium should not allow these subversive elements into its borders or in its economy. We must ensure that an event like this is never allowed to happen again.

Date: 17 June Dear Diary, I feel as if things may be finally looking up. I somehow managed to get support for the bill over 50%, and despite the scandal thing going on, I think that maybe it will be dropped off as just a rumor. The debates seemed to go very well! rigel said they didnt, but i am VERY confident that they are! Senator Charachter, the slimy scumbag she is, decided to try to try and pull the scandal to my face. I am just so happy that Rigel stood up for me. I have so much weighing on my mind all the time, that its nice that for once I can take a small breather to get back to work. On the bad side, Stocks started to tank upon news of the scandal. i have no idea by how much they will fall, but no doubt it will hurt the company severly. I hope Tim can forgive me for this whole politician endeavor. Frankly, i wish i could just resign, and go back to just being a buisness woman that all the girls of patrium could look up to, to aspire to be. Maybe once things are settled, I could try to ask Tim on a date perhaps, I mean, well, i dont know, it would be very unprofessional of me, and i dont want to ruin my freindship or buisness relationship with him... i... dont know what i should do there, but maybe this will work out for the best. character-confusion 27-Jun-20 11:15 AM
The Proletarian Guard (colloquially known as Tankie News Network) Part 1/2 Today we mourn the death of Senator Satiristic of The Unorthodox Grillers, tragically taken from us before his time by a brutal terrorist attack. We have lost a great senator today, and a great man. But why? Why did this happen? What was the bombers' motivation? Well, any cursory glance at the note they have left behind is enough to reveal what this person is: a libertarian using terror, violence, and murder to further their own agenda at the expense of the wellbeing of the country and the life of a fellow citizen. The note left behind by the bomber has stated that the reason for the attack is their personal distaste for recent senate decisions. And yet, comrades, I would ask, which decisions do they think do not represent the will of the people? The bill on farmers, passed with 79% of the vote? Or the infrastructure and borders bill, passed with 65% of the vote? Or the ongoing education bill, set to pass with 81% of the vote? Perhaps they should consider that they are alone, in the minority, attempting to impose their own warped ideals on the rest of Patrium, in their own sick way. (edited)

Part 2/2 Senator Character of the NLF has released the following statement: "This was a despicable act of cowardice, not just in its brutality, but in its target. Not only does this person commit acts of terror against their fellow citizens, but they would dare target a third party, a completely innocent and unrelated senator who has done nothing but bring reason, moderation, and practicality to our country? If this coward has a problem with how the NLF runs its party, they can come after me." Bold words from the senator, and yet they ring true. Our libertarian parties and their senators have proven themselves time and time again incapable of accepting positive change, and now their repellence has escalated to violence. Libertarianism has been a blight on this country for too long. Blind faith to the their idealism without regard for the world around them or the wellbeing of their countrymen has infected their parties, and now it has taken a life. This cannot be allowed to continue, and I urge our senators to take action against allowing anything like this to happen further.

The People's Tribunal - POLITICS: The AFL nominates Sen. Mega as Presiding Speaker candidate in stunning display of democracy 2020/6/27 The AFL has recently held its highly democratic primary elections for the position of Presiding Speaker. The results came back with a stunning victory for Sen. Mega, an outspoken figure in the Presidium of the AFL. The AFL has clearly formed a consensus around Sen. Mega's candidacy, who won with 100% of the votes. This shows the unrivaled democracy inside of the AFL, which is currently the only party who has held a primary election as of publication. He claims that his opponents have inspired him and helped him become better, saying "The party and my opponents have came to a consensus around our position. They have inspired me and I've incorporated many of their ideas into my actions. I thank everyone in the party and especially my opponents for challenging me and my campaign. Now is the time, as a party, to come together and win this election. I hope our coalition partners and comrades do the same and unite as a broad front to win this election!"

character-confusion 27-Jun-20 08:15 PM
The Proletarian Guard (colloquially known as Tankie News Network) Part 1/2 I write to you today, dear comrades, in rage and disbelief. Disbelief that so blatant a menace has been allowed to ravage our country for too long, and rage that more is not being done to stop it. I am of course speaking of the menace of libertarians. You all know them. The ones who have fought for so long to take away our privileges as Patrians, to take away the things that we all rely on to survive, and to lead fulfilling, secure lives. Who tried to rid our farmers of the Agricultural Department they so appreciate. Who tried to keep us from an education system that would allow all of our children access to the schooling we so desperately need. Who were found guilty of corruption in a selfish attempt to keep us from modernizing our road system. Time and time again, we citizens have told them, have shown them, that they do not represent our values. And yet they have continued to try to push them on us. And now, they have pushed too far. A senator is dead. Dead. And now, what, the senate does nothing? Sits idly by and waits for another attack? Another death? No, it cannot stand. And we, as upstanding Patrians, will not stand for it. We know who the threat is: it's the libertarians, and they must be stopped. Which is why we demand justice. We demand safety. We demand terrorism not be tolerated, and its perpetrators stopped. We demand investigations into top members and supporters of all libertarian parties, all those who may have been behind this attack, and all those who may carry out others like it. We demand that restrictions and procedures be put into place so that other tragedies like this cannot happen.
Part 2/2 But of course, we can do more than just make demands. We can take action. According to sources inside the party, NLF senators and top party members have already increased personal security as precaution against further attacks, and hope to encourage other government officials to do the same. And while our officials have much to fear, we as a people have much to be scared of as well. Will this bomber target civilians? Will other libertarians, spurred on by the attack, do the same? Already a wave of fear has rippled through much of the country, especially for those without security from the terrorists, or the means to provide it for themselves. How can they protect themselves from his threat? Fortunately, NLF supporters have taken up this mantle as well. The Red Guard, the paramilitary organization comprised mainly of NLF party members and supporters, has taken to the streets in cities across Patrium, taking up arms in defense of their countrymen against the libertarian menace. Going to the working-class neighborhoods that are the most vulnerable of our community, the base of NLF support and too often the target of libertarians' hatred. Risking their own lives to help the defenseless, and save them from terrorists. Which is why I beseech the government not to let this stand. Not to force our brave comrades to do your jobs for you. Not to allow libertarians to continue to run free, to harm our country and murder our citizens. We must stop them. We must cut off the problem at its root. We must destroy the menace of libertarian terrorists. (edited)

Forensics Update from Inspector Tobias Smith -The bomb had completely destroyed the outer layer of the body, no information could be gathered from viewing it -The skeleton was broken into multiple pieces. However, some bone parts were fractured, while others had seemed to be melted from the heat of the explosion. -DNA sampling revealed belonged to Senator Satiristic and one other unknown person -What seemed like an empty blood bag was found disposed of on investigation of the area (edited)

While we are relieved to know our friend and griller still may be alive out there, now there poses a different issue: where did he go?

someguyinshorts 28-Jun-20 09:58 AM
Knowledge Struggle
Two senators go missing, part 1 Hello everyone, welcome to KnowStrug, and today I have some sad news, it has made some rounds, two senators, Rigel and Character, bless their hearts, have been kidnapped by an unknown group. Now, while I’d love to blame this group, or shadow governments, or something along those lines, I’m not here for that, I’m here because of the absurd accusations made about our party during this crisis. Now, there have been some rumours that the NLF is behind the kidnappings. These are SIMPLY NOT TRUE DAMMIT! Why would a party, that as of late is pretty well off, do something as asinine as kidnap a very high ranking member. There is not one good reason to do so. Smear the libertarians? You can’t smear an entire group over one or two incidents, harm their reputation yes but the ability to distance themselves from the radical few leaves it a bad choice. Money? What money! The people that would pay the ransom would be ourselves, we would gain or loose nothing! Making us look better? How would having our own senator be kidnapped make us look better. I will say it again and I will say it till it needs not be said again, THE. NLF. HAS. NO. REASON. TO. KIDNAP. ITS. OWN. MEMBERS. PERIOD!!! These accusations are fantasies that have little basis in re reality except for some easily placeble pins, and I already covered in the last major investigation why putting your parties pin at the crime scene is moronic! I struggle to see how the knowledge given leads back to us. As for who did it, I don’t honestly know who, the evidence so far seems like it points too a small group with a hate for auths, not an auth group itself, the fact the NLF theory exists leaves me with a migraine, nothing about it makes sense! Well, that’s the struggle of getting knowledge to the proletariat, I’ll update the story as more info gets out, thank you for tuning in and thank the Proletarian Guard for letting me broadcast. Have a wonderful day and take care.

Senator Evans 28-Jun-20 07:56 PM
New Porto Times Sunday, June 28th Recently the Peace and Independence Party (PIP) has been rocked by yet another scandal. Evidence has came to light that suggests that Senator Orion plotted to kidnap Senator character. It also suggests that Senator Orion was involved in the kidnappings and disappearances of other prominent Patrian politicians. Senator Orion is currently missing. While the details of this investigation are of great importance to the future of Patrium, it is important that we don’t lose sight of the big picture. After two successive scandals the PIP’s members and voters must ask themselves if they still are willing to support such a corrupt institution. It is time for the PIP’s senators to ask whether their corrupt sinking ship of a party is more important than the causes they claim to care about. It is time for the PIP’s senators to make a choice: will they disband and join other parties or will they stay complicit in their party’s corruption? Only time will tell.

The People's Tribunal - BREAKING NEWS: Evans selected as delegate to summit Written on 2020/06/30 Sen. Rigel has officially announced his pick for the delegate from the AFL to the Jaziran Island Summit, Sen. Evans, despite pledging to pick the most active people from each party. The other likely candidate was Sen. Mega, whom Rigel fought in a controversial Supreme Senator election. Sen. Evans spoke on being selected, declaring "The Jaziran Island Summit is a time for peace and prosperity between the nations of the island. I thank Sen. Rigel for picking me to be part of the delegation representing Patrium. I plan to have all my decisions based on a consensus within the party," The young technocratic senator has previously came under fire for his alleged links to Chinese business executives, despite being a member of the Anarchist Federation of Labor [Federação Anarquista do Trabalho]. The AFL has condemned these attacks as unfounded and xenophobic. Sen. Mega has also spoken, emphasizing unity on the matter, saying "While I'd have preferred Rigel stick to his pledge, the party ought to unite around Sen. Evans, a competent leader and negotiator. We mustn't bend down to the forces trying to control the party and break us apart. We must also remember that Sen. Evans represents the AFL and the people, so no need to fret over the lack of democracy on this matter, as we were lucky to get a good represent. I have no respect for those interfering in and decimating the legitimacy of our inner-party democracy." (edited)
[continued] He has spoken about people letting personal vendettas come in the way of good policy as well, saying "Whatever mud was slung in the election shall stay there. I hope my fellow candidates will also leave the election's controversy behind and usher in a new age of good policy. I'd hope a scandalous party wouldn't want to start anymore." When briefed about what he will push for at the Summit, Sen. Evans said that he supports more integration, open borders, ending Thuzland's human rights abuses, an island development fund, and an EU-esque organization, but he will ultimately follow the consensus in his party. He hopes that this summit will prevent any military conflicts that may happen as well as make sure the island stays peaceful and prosperous. (edited)

The Proletarian Guard (colloquially known as Tankie News Network) Part 1/2 We recently covered the story of the corruption of AFL's @Senator Evans. We had hoped the senator would accept the consequences of his actions with grace and dignity. It seems, however, that he cannot. Rather, his response to being investigated was to attempt to launch an investigation back into the person who turned him in, Senator Character. Thankfully, this cowardly and vindictive action has failed, as the Corruption Oversight Committee has deemed that nothing worthy of investigation has even transpired. However, we must look at how this was able to happen - for an investigation to be considered, twelve senators must have signed the request. Inside sources say these included senators from AFL, PIP, ILP, and TUG. Now we must ask ourselves: how could these parties' senators be so naive to allow themselves to be manipulated by Senator Evans, someone they knew to be corrupted? Or perhaps they knew about the corruption but were in on it with Evans. Or perhaps they didn't care one way or another whether corruption occurred, but simply jumped on the opportunity to have a fellow senator investigated, no matter the truth of it.
Part 2/2 Because we must address the clear issue here, comrades: we must look at parties that signed on to this, the parties that so easily disregarded logic, reason, and evidence in favor of dogmatism, demagoguery, and lies. AFL, PIP, ILP - all of the country's major libertarian parties, not to mention TUG, the party that recently housed a terrorist and murderer, working alongside them. And of course, notice the lack of any authoritarian parties signing on to the nonsense. This is what our country is devolving into. Our libertarian senators are willing to pull any immoral and partisan action, even attempting to investigate a senator with so little cause that an investigation can't be launched. This is clearly a desperate attempt by Senator Evans as petty revenge for his own corruption, and we must ask ourselves why all of our libertarian parties were so eager to enable him.

parm 13-Jul-20 03:01 PM
New Porto Times - Local Senator Caught Slipping Drugs into the Senate Building Recently, Sen. Mega has been caught possessing and consuming several drugs in the Senate building during the session. This isn't his first time doing this, he was previously caught doing the same thing in the New Porto City Council, during his tenure as an LSF councillor. The drugs were found in a duffel bag under Sen. Mega's desk by a janitor. They included cannabis, Xanax, alcohol, cocaine, and an unknown substance. Sen. Mega has apologized for this behavior, saying "I am deeply sorry and I regret my actions in the Senate today. The past week has been stressful; my city has been destroyed by a tsunami and my grandmother is ill. I promise not to do this again, ever. I will be focusing on the recovery of New Porto in the next few weeks. I am deeply ashamed as well. I shouldn't have let the stress of my secondary duty of safeguarding New Porto put my professionalism in question." The drugs were kept away from everyone else and there has been no evidence of contamination to anyone nor has he distributed drugs to anyone. No charges have been levied on him as of yet. He said he will remain in the contention for being the next Supreme Senator and will continue to hold up his bid against incumbent Sen. Rigel because he believes that his lapse in judgement should not define him as a person and that he still manages to clear the ethical bar for the candidates.

parm 17-Jul-20 03:59 PM
Statement from Sen. Mega It is with a heavy heart I say this; I am dropping out of the Supreme Senator election. I have thought long and hard about this and I love serving the people of Patrium. The problem is that I am busy enough as a Senator as well as outside of the Senate, especially caring for my hometown of New Porto. I am sure that I will return someday in the future, but I believe it's in the best interests of myself, the Senate, and Patrium to sit this one out. I wish to remain on the ballot, but I am fine if I am left off. In turn, I endorse Sen. Billy Apostolatos for Supreme Senator. Now you may think "What? Why the hell did an anarchist endorse a right-wing nationalist?" The truth of the matter is that these ideological labels shouldn't matter for an apolitical position. I endorsed Billy because I believe he'd carry out the duties of Supreme Senator better than any other candidate still in the race. I support his proposal for a Constitutional Convention to draft a direly needed new Patrian constitution with the consensus of all of the parties. I also believe that the people would support voting for a fresh, new senator over establishment figures. I support Billy not because of some ideological reasons, I support him as a candidate because he would exercise the roles of Supreme Senator best, in my opinion. About me, I plan on using this break from politics to reflect on how to better craft policy and how to act more co-operatively with other senators. I plan on spending even more time with my constituents and writing more legislation. Finally I will say this: you should vote for your conscience. You should vote for: Billy, if you think he is the best Rigel, if you think he is the best Memes, if you think he is the best (or if you hate all of them) I believe Billy is the best and have already explained why. — Sen. Mega (AFL, New Porto)

How can we trust him? But the truly horrifying blow to democracy came later, with the passage of his security bill. A very popular measure among the senators, it passed at a whopping 24-3 votes. When asked how he would select the bill's security committee, as is the SS's duty, he said that he would give seats to every party except LOGIC (understandable, frankly) and the Druids. Now, why the Druids? In his words, they would not get a seat because they did not vote for the bill. This is textbook suppression of political opponents. He would refuse to allow power to those that voted against him, use his power to punish them for daring to oppose them. I ask you, how long before he refuses another party's bill, or denies them debate time, just for exercising their right to democracy? How will he continue to threaten the other parties, and even our democracy itself?

MemesOnPizza 24-Jul-20 10:59 AM
The Logical Times 2020-7-24 Poll conducted for people in Nuevo Brabrante English: A poll was conducted for people in Nuevo Brabrante. During diplomatic talks with Jazira, Selva, and Patrium, Prime Minister Maya Garcia shared poll results. Here is a quote directly from him/er Questions:
1. Are you native Thuzi or Patrian 2. From these agegroups, which are you (agegroups are ones shown above 3. Are you of sound mental health (if not, then the vote was removed 4. Do you support a plan to move all Thuzis to North Nuevo brabrante/ a plan to partition South Nuevo Brabrante 5. Do you support the merging of Nuevo Brabrante and the annexation of it by Thuzland
Results:
BY AGE: among age group 15-25, 64% answered yes to the first question, and 18% answered yes to the second.
>
among age group 25-60, 48% answered yes to the first question and 30% answered yes to the second.
>
among age group 60-, 70% answered yes to the first question and 43% voted yes to the second. BY ETHNICITY Among the group of native Thuzlanders, 72% answered yes to the first question, and 23% answered yes for the second question
>
Among the group of native Patrians, 32% answered yes to the first question, and 2% answered yes to the second.
>
Among the mixed race members, 75% answered yes to the first question, and 40% answered yes to the second. ADDITION TO THE POLL
>
PER WISHES, THE ANSWERERS THAT SAID YES HAVE BEEN ASKED WHETHER THEY WANT A PARTITION OR MOVEMENT
>
80% VOTED FOR MOVEMENT WITH COMPENSATION.
>
IF A DEMOGRAPHIC BREAKDOWN IS REQUIRED, PLEASE INFORM
Русский: A опрос был проведен для людей в Нуэво-Брабранте. Во время дипломатических переговоров с Джазирой, Сельвой и Патриумом премьер-министр Майя Гарсия поделилась результатами опроса. Вот цитата прямо от него / эр Вопросы:
1. Ты родной тузи или патриан 2. Из этих возрастных групп, которые вы (возрастные группы указаны выше) 3. У вас крепкое психическое здоровье (если нет, то голосование сняли 4. Поддерживаете ли вы план переброски всех тузов в Северный Нуэво Брабранте / план разделения Южного Нуэво Брабранте? 5. Поддерживаете ли вы слияние Nuevo Brabrante и аннексию Thuzland?
Полученные результаты:
ПО ВОЗРАСТУ: В возрастной группе 15-25 лет 64% ответили утвердительно на первый вопрос, а 18% ответили утвердительно на второй.
в возрастной группе 25-60 лет 48% ответили утвердительно на первый вопрос, а 30% ответили утвердительно на второй. Среди возрастной группы 60-70% ответили «да» на первый вопрос, а 43% проголосовали «за» на второй.
ПО ЭТНИЧНОСТИ Среди группы тузландцев, 72% ответили утвердительно на первый вопрос, а 23% ответили утвердительно на второй вопрос.
Среди группы коренных патриотов 32% ответили «да» на первый вопрос, а 2% ответили «да» на второй. Среди участников смешанной гонки 75% ответили утвердительно на первый вопрос, а 40% ответили утвердительно на второй.
ДОПОЛНЕНИЕ К ОПРОСУ
ПОЗДРАВЛЯЕМ, ОТВЕТЫ, КОТОРЫЕ СКАЗАЛИ ДА, ЗАПРОСИЛИ, ЧТО ОНИ ХОТЯТ РАЗДЕЛЕНИЕ ИЛИ ДВИЖЕНИЕ 80% проголосовали за движение с компенсацией. ЕСЛИ ТРЕБУЕТСЯ ДЕМОГРАФИЧЕСКИЙ ПЕРЕРЫВ, ОБРАТИТЕ ВНИМАНИЕ

Apataz's push has slowed as well as Thuziland has finally managed to respond to the surprise push
However we can bring great news from the north as Jazira have formally joined Patrim in our war efforts
the have begun a full front assault to help aid in the defense of Patrium
the president of Jazira said in a statement today; "We stand hand in hand with our brothers across the island and will stop at nothing to save Patrium from the Thuzi threat

Amaaroc 12-Aug-20 06:46 PM
(Interviewed by character the person playing an interviewer) On the Murder of Supreme Senator William Apostolatos: An interview with Senator Orion Rigel Interviewer: What is your relationship to Niels? Would you describe yourself as "friends"? Rigel: Absolutely not. We were friends in college, I think we had a one night stand but I've been trying to push the crazy bastard away for a while now. We're nowhere near that now. Interviewer: Does he have any history of mental illness? How would you describe his current mental state, in your personal estimation? Rigel: He's already been sent to the psych ward before. I don't know the proper names of his mental illnesses because I don't ask and don't want to know, but he's had a fairly lengthy history of it. As for right now? Still awful. He's erratic, over-emotional, delusional -- I think he needs to go back to the psych ward, to be frank. Interviewer: Did you know he was behind the senator's murder? If so, when? Rigel: I didn't hear anything about the murder from him, but I suspected it. He came to me afterwards and kept acting crazy, blathering more nonsense than anything, saying I was his now and I should love him now and this and that. So I pushed him away.
Interviewer: And after this encounter, why did you not share your suspicions with anyone? Rigel: He threatened my death, the death of my lover, the death of my coworkers. He's the reason I can't walk, and he did it before I grew suspicious of him for Billy's murder. Interviewer: So he was behind the bombing of your car? Why do you believe he did that? Rigel: I'm pretty sure he's behind it. I called him because I was suspicious of his being behind the other attacks on PNP -- the vandalism, the bombings. I wanted to know why -- he didn't have much reason to -- and he blew up my car and came to the hospital telling me it was a warning, and not to talk about things I shouldn't talk about. Interviewer: Do you believe you are responsible for Senator Apostolatos's murder? Rigel: No! No, gods, no. I wasn't the one who poisoned him. I didn't tell him to do it. I didn't want him to do it. I kept trying to force myself away from him, even. I tried to get him to stop. Interviewer: The late senator's brother seems to believe you are responsible for his death through your inaction and association. What would you say to him? Rigel: To Senator Constantine I would say: you would ask the unreasonable? You ask a man who's already almost been killed to risk his own life, and the lives of everyone around him, just for a suspicion of who the murderer was? You'd prefer so, so many senators to die, taking out our stability, just so you know earlier. I don't have foresight, I didn't know this war would happen and you can't blame me for the war or for his death.

character-confusion 16-Aug-20 10:05 AM
Aftermath of the War of Thuzi Aggression With the hard-fought war now over, Patrium has begun the long and arduous process of rebuilding. Along the east coast and in the north, millions are flooding back into the vacated cities, and portions of the army and volunteers are working to reconstruct the damaged buildings and infrastructure. President Taylor and the senate have begun relocation back to St. Solomon. To the north, the land annexed by Patrium in the peace deal is still occupied by forces led by General Waller and General Atapaz. The area, dubbed the Provisional Acquisition Region (PAR), has thus far been the site of many protests against the Patrian government, but they have been largely contained by the Patrian military presence. Numerous questions still remain about the fate of the PAR. President Alexander A. Cortez has released the following statement. “We are deeply sorry to Patrium for the invasion. We accept full responsibility for this unfortunate conflict. I will be stepping down from my position as President, and we will be holding new elections shortly.” (edited)
Arksiane 16-Aug-20 10:10 AM
The War is over This statement was aired in the Jaziran Times by the government of Jazira. Jazirans across the nation rejoice as the war in Thuzland has ended. The war took nearly a 100,000 jaziran lives and hurt Jaziran-Selvan relations greatly. In this time of rebuilding, Jazira is starting a new plan for industrialization and building increased infrastructure in our new holdings. Free press is also permitted, now that the war is over. Many people have been asking what will be done with native Thuzis in the land we have gained. However, unlike Patrium we think Thuzis are people, so we will not displace them. However, we will be starting funds to buy out their land and give them better homes, as their quality of life is low. The citizens we have gained shall be (non-mandatorily) educated in Jaziran culture and dialect. We also request Patrium to repeal https://docs.google.com/document/d/14-9K9v9IuWVNkqIxGnmHZVMOgGsfGAeddojUuf-gj24/edit?usp=sharing, as it has not had a major impact and hurts our Census Office In other news, the Ministers have won the Jaziran Cricket Championship, which drew in a record viewership of 1.1 million people, nearly 1/9th of the population.

The Logical Times 2020-8-16 Opinion Piece: Candidates for Supreme Senator - by Anu Cheekibreekiivdamke English: Right now, the senate is having a vote for Supreme Senator, the senator who dictates debates. Here are the candidates and my opinions on them: 1. Cykablyat Idinahui: he is a member of LOGIC, the most rational party in Patrium. Plus, he knows what he wants and knows how to get there. In my opinion, the senate should vote for him. 2. : the senator, from TNO, has shown his basedness on numerous occasions. Because the brainwashed senators do not like anything to do with LOGIC, seems like the only good senator with a chance of winning. 3. Jarx: he has been a very low-profile senator until recently, largely because he is not the head of any parties. Senators do not know about him, but if they learn more, he might, sadly, have a chance. 4. Jebediah Augustine: he is the head of PPE, a very insignificant party in the senate and one that has been on the decline recently. He is a moderate, so he might appeal to the more moderate senators. However, given that Patrium is, thankfully, a country with not many political moderates, he will have barely and chance of winning in my opinion.
Русский: Прямо сейчас сенат голосует за Верховного сенатора, сенатора, который диктует дебаты. Вот кандидаты и мое мнение о них: 1. Цыкаблят Идинахуи: член LOGIC, самой рациональной партии в Патриуме. Кроме того, он знает, чего хочет, и знает, как этого добиться. На мой взгляд, за него должен проголосовать сенат. 2.: symbols :: abcd :: 1234 :: сенатор от TNO неоднократно демонстрировал свою основательность. Поскольку сенаторы с промытыми мозгами не любят ничего общего с ЛОГИКОЙ,: symbols :: abcd :: 1234: кажется единственным хорошим сенатором, имеющим шанс на победу. 3. Джаркс: до недавнего времени он был очень скромным сенатором, в основном потому, что он не возглавляет какие-либо партии. Сенаторы ничего о нем не знают, но если они узнают больше, у него, к сожалению, может быть шанс. 4. Джебедия Августин: он глава PPE, очень незначительной партии в сенате, которая в последнее время находится в упадке. Он умеренный, поэтому может понравиться более умеренным сенаторам. Однако, учитывая, что Патриум, к счастью, страна, в которой немного умеренных политических деятелей, я считаю, что у него будет мало шансов на победу.

During his inauguration speech, President Bennet declared, “Thuzland has remained an isolated nation for too long. It is time we bring ourselves forward into this new era. It is time we make foreign allies, rather than enemies. Only in this way can we begin to rebuild our great country.”

Amaaroc 17-Aug-20 02:52 PM
Thuzi Spy Turned Honorary Patrian A very young former Thuzi spy, Santana Morales, has been given the title of “Honorary Patrian” by Senators Rigel, Shorts, Character, and Lawrence. During the war, he chose to act as a double agent, giving the Thuzis false information on where to attack while giving much needed intel to the major senators to help with the war. He’s been given an apartment to stay in by Senator Shorts and is hoping to gain citizenship status soon. While we wanted to interview him, he smiled, shook his head and denied with the reasoning of “I’m not throwing myself to the sharks right after I swam in those waters.” He may have been able to sneak by and lay low during the war, but now he’s a hot topic in the recently acquired territories— to many, he has the the potential to be a Thuzi representative and and good advisor; to others he’s a traitor. We hope he’ll tell more in an interview soon.
character-confusion 17-Aug-20 05:09 PM
Conditions in the Provisional Acquisition Region In Patrium’s newly acquired region from Thuzland, conditions have continued to worsen. Roads, buildings, and infrastructure destroyed in the war remain in shambles, and without intervention from the Patrian government, no one has stepped in to begin repairs. Local Thuzi leader Emilio Medina, a mayor with a background as a pastor, has sent the following plea in a speech given at a protest in Luctown: “To the Patrian senate: please, we beseech you, help us begin to repair our cities, our towns, our countryside. Help us fix what you have destroyed.” The protest was dispersed by the Patrian military soon after. (edited)

Senator Lawrence, PIP, Elected Supreme Senator Another Supreme Senator has been elected, and, unsurprisingly, it is yet another member of PIP. Several other senators were very hopeful going into this election, thinking that with Orion Rigel no longer head of PIP, with the NLF no longer backing them, PIP's hold on the senate might loosen. After two terms served by Rigel, interrupted only briefly by a partially served term by William Apostolatos of the PNP before he was murdered by an acquaintance of Rigel's, PIP's near-monopoly on the office of Supreme Senator continues. How long will it be before another party can break it?

UN Condemn Patrium over Accusations of Genocidal Rhetoric The United Nations is now considering investigating Patrium for accusations of the advocation of war crimes and genocide against the Thuzi people. An anonymous source has provided information that several of Patrium's largest parties were involved. If these claims are substantiated, it may mean the investigation and possible removal of involved senators. Jazira, one of Patrium's allied countries in the Nuevo Brabanta War against Thuzland, has said, "If true, we condemn these statements by Patrian senators. We cannot in good faith ally with such countries." The United States, another ally of Patrium's in the war, has not yet commented.

Amaaroc 19-Aug-20 01:00 AM
Muslims Around Patrium Enraged By Hassan II (and his Lawyer) “We’re tired of being a meat shield!” and “Using us to shield your crimes is unacceptable!” are the current chants against Hassan II and his lawyer by the Muslim communities of Patrium. “We won’t stand a man trying to stand behind us and claiming his insubordination is for our people,” a vocal protestor responded in an interview. “We won’t stand his corruption against Patrium and we won’t stand him claiming it was for us, of all things.” He goes on to continue after a pause for a drink. “He doesn’t realize we’re people of Patrium as well. He doesn’t realize he’s hurting us, too. He doesn’t realize that his accusations have come up for a reason, and his constant fabrications prove further and further how he’s no more than a selfish man who follows himself over following Allah. If he can’t prove himself innocent and helpful without having to loop around his arguments so much, he can’t prove himself at all.” Social media in Patrium has skyrocketed against Hassan after the initial movement, many criticizing the lawyer. “I wouldn’t take that lawyer if I was even paid to,” an anonymous lady wrote. “It looks like he’s doing more harm than good. You’re supposed to do good if you’re trying to get someone being charged for treason free, right?”

Deleted User 19-Aug-20 04:01 PM
Pew Research Center As efforts to enact more progressive social reforms are talked about in the Indian Ocean nation of Patrium we dedicated to look into its population An estimated 430,000 Patrians identify themselves as gay. Or around 1.3% of the population. Though this may not be as accurate due to the stigma that comes with being homosexual. A more accurate estimation may be somewhere in the ballpark of 900,000-1,100,000 Patrians, ranging from around 2.9-3.5% of the population. The numbers of the transgender community in the island republic are significantly smaller. Our polling data on the matter puts the total transgender population at around 4,500 or around .015%. The most our estimates put the population would be at approximately 6,000 individuals or around .019%. But this data is still very much inconclusive.

character-confusion 21-Aug-20 10:56 AM
Thuzi Protest Devolves into Armed Conflict A protest today in Philipstown, a major city in Patrium's newly acquired land, erupted into armed conflict between the protesters and the nearby military after several shots were heard fired from the crowd. The military's response and consequent escalation from the crowd resulted in two fatalities, as well as 28 injured. The protest was dispersed soon after, and a curfew put into place for the night. Although the origin of the conflict is unknown, many protesters are currently being detained and questioned in connection to it. Emilio Medina, a Thuzi mayor who has risen to prominence for his outspoken opposition to the Patrian occupation and demands for the regions' independence, has given the following statement to the press: "The treatment the Patrians have given us is unacceptable. We will never be free under their rule. We must have independence from their tyrannical government!"

Patrium Today In our exclusive interview with the esteemed conquerer of Thuzland, General Ioannis Waller, we discussed his thoughts on the incident in Phillipstown and he gave us this quote, “The situation in the PAR is putting a lot of strain on the army with an inability to function swift and decisively. I urge the Senate to give the military martial law in the PAR, to deal with this crisis. The military must be given the authority to... civilize... this region”. We here at Patrium Today agree with Waller, we need to get this region under our control NOW and incorporate it into Patrium proper in the near future. Also at PT we urge the Senate to give Waller the title of Thuzicus, the conquerer of Thuzis. Again we reiterate the words of the great General Waller, we need martial law now! Glory to Waller, God bless Patrium and God bless President Taylor!

character-confusion 26-Aug-20 05:41 PM
New Measures in the PAR The implementation of the new reconstruction bill has begun. Of the approximately 8.7 million Thuzi-Patris in the region, 125k have thus far signed up for the naturalization program, with the vast majority choosing to work rather than serve in the military. The government has begun reconstruction of cities across the PAR and Patrium proper, as well as the redirection of local resources toward these efforts. The reception of these measures in the PAR has been overwhelmingly negative. Unrest in the region has increased, with a swell in protests, riots, and armed conflict. As per the latest direction from the Senate, more military forces have been deployed to deal with the conflict. It remains to be seen whether these conflicts will escalate or die down. This is a developing story and will continue to be updated. (edited)

Arksiane 27-Aug-20 08:08 AM
The New Era: Inside Jaziran occupied zones of Thuzland -By Amanda Hargrove With all the concern going on in the USA about the "concentration camps" set up for refugees, I decided to go to a place which may actually have concentration camps, Patrium to compare the situations. Unfortunately, Patrian politicians didnt allow me inside, so i decided to check in on the neighbours instead. Patrium has a lot of eyes on it from communists and extremists all over the world, but its neighbours are surprisingly relaxed places. Selva is essentially a social democratic country, while Jazira is quite nationalistic and democratic (despite having to put down Islamic insurgencies just a month ago). However, since only Jazira has occupied Thuzi territory, I decided to go there. In Jazira, i met a strange man named Pius Bucksin. He talked slightly oddly, but seemed like an alright man. He led me to the outskirts of the occupied zone, where some men drove me over to the town square. Surprisingly, it didnt look to terrible, however starved the people looked. Bucksin explained to me that the Thuzi government had given children and adults barely any food at all and his people were attempting to save the population. This was unlike the Patrian occupied zone (according to him). When we finally reached the inside, there were many buildings being built. Bucksin told me that the people were living in shacks, so they decided to build more apartments to live in. This was all part of the integration plan, which gave Thuzis full citizenship and allowed them freedoms that regular citizens had. The plan was being set back by locals prejudices, but the area was being integrated slowly I wasnt able to see much more, but my impression so far was quite positive. Sadly, we can only wonder what the Patrian occupied zone looks like. (edited)

Since the passage of the order, there has been a drastic decrease in anti-Patrian protests. This comes on the heels of a meeting between the Overseer and several leaders of the protest movement. When asked for a comment, one of the men in attendance said, “We see this as a victory, earning ourselves citizenship and a raise in wages for the naturalization program. We should be proud of what we’ve accomplished.”

character-confusion 27-Aug-20 10:34 PM
Lack of Productivity Leads to PAR Dissatisfaction In the wake of the recent decision by the Provisional Overseer to give all Thuzi-Patris in the PAR citizenship status, enrollment in the previously created naturalization work and military program has dropped by more than 80%. When one young man was asked why he quit the program, he responded, "I only wanted my citizenship. I'm not working for the Patrians if I've already got it." Productivity on repairs of the cities has ground to a halt without a labor force to work on them, and with the nationalization of industries in the region, the private sector is unable to fill the absence. Discontent at the continually un-repaired state of the region's infrastructure has grown, as well as opposition to the forced collectivization of many businesses in the area. Reports of equipment sabotaged by its previous owners have been filed by the government agencies in charge of the reconstruction. Party approval among NLF voters have decreased, with many voters saying they are unsatisfied with the policy that Senator Shorts has implemented as Overseer, a drastic departure from the party's previous rhetoric and policy goals. (edited)

character-confusion 29-Aug-20 08:09 AM
Economic Reform in the PAR A new order by the PAR Provisional Overseer has declared the re-privatization of much of the area’s economy. This comes on the heels of concerns over the area’s lack of budget, as well as discontent over the state of the work program, which has since been disbanded. The construction industry, as well as several other key industries, will remain nationalized in order to aid in reconstruction and economic recovery. An increase in sales and corporate taxes, as well as selling back nationalized land, will be used to fund the incentives programs for government work. Reconstruction has begun and is now estimated to be completed only a few months behind schedule. The economy is still struggling though the drastic restructuring, and we have yet to see how these changes will be received by the public. (edited)

The following commercial airs on Patrian networks
3
Gentle music plays over a black background. As an image fades in, we see video footage of several men working in a mine, hardhats with flashlights on their heads, pickaxes over their shoulders. We fade to another picture, of a man and woman standing in a forest, one holding an axe, the other the other gesturing to a nearby tree. Finally we fade to a shot of a wide-open pasture, cows grazing across it, a man standing next to one and stroking it. "Mining. Logging. Farming. Some of our nations most important industries." We see a small cabin home, a Patrian flag flying off the porch. A woman and two small children sit at a table on the porch. A man, clearly their father, walks up to the porch and greets them with a smile "Their workers, the heart and soul of Patrium." Shows the same family, now at the dinner table happily enjoying a meal together. "But their livelihoods are being threatened by choking regulations."
We see a shot of a woman, dressed in farm clothes, a barn in the background. She stands next to a cow, gently stoking it’s back, and says to us, “I live right near a roc breeding ground, and I’ve had two of my cows killed by them, another four injured. Much more of this and I won’t have enough to run the farm.” We see a shot of a man’s head and shoulders, in front of a mining site, his clothes a bit stained with black streaks. He says, “I worked in this mine since I was sixteen, and now I hear they might be shutting it down, all cause some higher-ups in St. Solomon don’t care to keep our business open.” He shakes his head. Shows men at a dock, loading crates onto a ship. Then shows a group of people working on an assembly line. Finally shows children playing near a river. "Our trade destroyed, our industries crippled, our people kept in poverty." The children from the previous shot run toward a small shack of a house, toward a woman who takes them into her embrace. "We must protect our children, and guide them toward prosperity." A man on a farm pulls a plant from the ground and holds it up. The sun's rays shine from behind his head as he smiles widely. "If you care about our citizens, our workers, our country...Support Space Voluntaryism and the Protect our Farmers and Miners Act. Keep Patrium in business." The music swells. Words flash on the screen reading: Protect our Farmers and Miners Act. Sponsored by Space Voluntaryism and Barnes Mining Co.
4
At the end, we hear a voiceover: "I'm Jason Smith of the SV and I approve this message!"

character-confusion 01-Sep-20 09:15 AM
Continuing Tensions in the PAR Tensions remain high in the PAR as the region continues to struggle through economic recovery. The attempt at a transition back to the private sector have been slow as reluctance to participate in buybacks and to invest is high. Although unemployment is decreasing, and the benefits provided with government jobs are helping many, there have been many complaints about the lack of such benefits for other Thuzi-Patri, and opinion of Patrium and of the Overseer's administration among those not working for the government is much lower. The construction of the first facility for the Loyalization Program has recently been completed. It is located several miles outside of Nuevo Madrid. Construction on three other such facilities is still underway and expected to be completed within the next few weeks, near Buenamadre, Nuevo Antonio, and Seneca. All of these sites have been the location of many protests by local Thuzi-Patri, including some attempt at sabotage of their construction. Military guards have since been sent to the sites, and upon opening they will be staffed in part by military personnel. The Nuevo Madrid Loyalization Center will officially open next week.

The State of Patrium Sun Roc kidnaps a Senator These wild animals have been roaming in our lush forests for milennia and humans and Sun Rocs have been able to peacefully co-exist to now. However, a spike of recent cases of increased Sun Roc aggression may have been from the destabilization of natural Sun Roc habitats in place for urban development. A bright new Future However, things might be looking up for Sun Rocs. The TPO suggests creating natural reservations in order to protect long-time Sun Roc habitats and also develop Patrium's developing Tourism industry. Abe Political says, "These birds have lived here before this place has been inhabited by humans and the vast, lush habitat of Patrium must be preserved for generation to come." An alternative he suggests might also to domesticate these wild beasts so they could live peacefully with humans like humans and dogs and become man's best friend. Jeb 03-Sep-20 09:54 AM
Patrian National News Criminal group found spreading fake news Yesterday afternoon, a group of police officers raided a small office building which was said to be one of the centers of operations of a large criminal group involved in several crimes agaisnt the Patrian government and people. Inside were found several members of the group wanted by the Patrian government, along with unexpected findings related to the recent scandal around the secretive organization called "Ozy's estate" and a few people from the Senate. It was found that the criminal group had created a front organization dedicated to spreading false information surrounding the government, printing leaflets and posting news online that criticized it for its actions and blamed it for several crimes and injustices; the motives of the criminal group are still unkown, although a prominent hypothesis is that they wanted to deestabilize the Patrian government to obtain more power over the people and to ease their operations. character-confusion 06-Sep-20 01:21 PM
Nuevo Madrid Loyalization Center Opens The first participants have recently been sent to the Thuzi-Patri Loyalization Program. Most of these participants include those who have continued to protest both the construction of the loyalization centers and the general Patrian presence in the PAR. Thus far, 536 people have been sent to the program. These people will continue to work in the Loyalization Centers, as well as to attend classes run by the centers, until such as time as they are deemed loyal citizens. We were given a tour of the Nuevo Madrid Loyalization Center before its opening. Of the sections we were shown, the interior appears much like a regular factory building. Both the work wing and the educational wing are not barren, but instead decorated with inspirational posters, images, and messaging. The outside of the facility is more fortified, fenced in with a gated entrance and guard tower. Military personnel continue to patrol the exterior as well as the interior. Protests in the immediate area have all but disappeared with the opening of the center. Thus far, one admittant has refused to attend, and was subsequently arrested.

character-confusion 06-Sep-20 04:07 PM
TPO Extralegal Detainment Facility Discovered It has recently been discovered that during the War of Thuzi Aggression, The Patrian Order kidnapped five Thuzis and placed them in a facility where they were tortured for information and subsequently forced to undergo mind-altering procedures. This was done without the knowledge or consent of any part of the government. The five Thuzis have been released from the facility two days ago, and are being treated before being sent back to their home country. In an interview, one Thuzi described the experience, saying they were kept in barren rooms, given little food, and repeatedly verbally and sometimes physically abused. Another described being tortured with a poisonous plant, putting him in what he calls "indescribable pain worse than Hell". The TPO facility is currently under investigation. (edited)
