Senator Morshu Ferrok 16-Dec-20 11:11 PM
THE DAILY LIBERATOR UNPRECEDENTED DESTRUCTION, JAMESVILLE WIPED OFF MAP, DEATH NOT SEEN SINCE WORLD WAR TWO The battle started off amazingly, a force of 2.5 thousand PIP LDF Militia Members fighting against an invading force of 6 thousand TPO veteran infantrymen. The death toll rose, as reinforcements arrived for both sides. It seemed like the perfect victory for the rebels, Jamesville would be defended in a battle reminiscent of Rorke's Drift. Reinforcements for the PIP arrived, and the TPO forces would be encircled. However it was not to be. On both sides, radar picked up that a large force of aircraft was approaching. The ground shook much before the deafening roar was heard. The sky over eastern Jamesville turned black with hundreds of bombs, then suddenly red, as they went off. In mere seconds, the suburbs of Pila and Arkburn were gone, alongside the better half of Jamesville itself. As if this scepter of death had not claimed enough souls, it was not the end. No, the end came when a half ton high explosive bomb fell through the roof of Reactor 4 of the Jamesville City Nuclear Power Plant. in the next 10 seconds, the perfect series of events would occur, and the 100 tons of radioactive material in the core produced far, far more energy than it ever would have been imagined to. All structures within a kilometer of the blast, with the exclusion of only the very sturdiest remaining as skeletons. Any people surviving the carpet bombing lived only these 10 seconds more. The death toll is currently unknown, but it is estimated to have been between 100,000 and 250,000, with hundreds of thousands more slowly dying of radiation poisoning, dehydration, starvation, and other additional factors. This day will forever live in infamy. God bless those trapped in the ruins of what was once such a grand city, and may they rest in peace. (Pictured below: A resident of Jamesville stands at the location of his home, where he had lived with his wife and three children)

Dieselkeough 19-Dec-20 11:29 PM
Foundation Press Release: Doctor Marina Bleu: "The Foundation and myself do not support the "Build Back Better 2022" act. For one, loose wording allows for severe abuses by an immoral government official and agents. Secondly the bill puts in place a labour draft, with no guaruntee for pay for those drafted, leading to people being forced into what can be government backed slavery. Thirdly, cameras on many streets, with no specification on where they cannot go will allow for the breach of privacy and lack of morality within the government. While security is important, this crosses a distinctive line. Fourthly, the government cannot be criticised under this act, and with its major loose wording, this means the government can do pretty much anything, including immoral behaviors and not be able to be protested by the people. Fifthly, this will destroy workers unions. By emforcing state mandated and regulated unions which cannot unionise against state backed companies, it allows for abuses in the workplace. Sixthly, it lowers taxes overall while we are in massive debt. This will only hurt us long term, and the idea that it will bring companies to patrium will not work, as it hadnt worked in so many other nations. So i, and my associates will refuse to support this bill."
Big Brother (Clement2022) 19-Dec-20 11:37 PM
The State of Patrium Big Brother's plan for economic recovery and jobs for the working class is currently being voted on. To transition Patrium from a weak, poorly controlled, agriculture state, into an industrial powerhouse, the bill involves creating good paying jobs through a national union, building infrastructure to accelerate economic growth and create more jobs, as well as cutting taxes for the poor to stimulate economic growth and allow for more money to spend on the goods they want. However, the cirticism that we will cause a budget deficit is but utter NONSENSE. The bill created a property tax, which taxes the rich and those able to pay, smoking, liquor, and gambling to discourage use, and an excise tax on those vice products. There is no labour draft in the bill unless you think working for a good paying wage is wage slavery. Work makes you free /s. Now for the criticism of the Polcams, they are specifically in public facilities so Patrians can feel more safe without getting mugged, killed, or even raped. Now the claim we will destroy unions is more ridiculous as the bill created a national union just to ensure the jobs will be good paying and allow for collective bargaining. The senators who oppose are bourgeoisie who want to prolong the war or are bought out by foreign interests. We will take this country back by making Patrians roads, Patrians jobs, and Patrian sovereignty!

Opossumod 22-Dec-20 08:10 PM
TERRORIST ATTACK IN NEUVEO MADRID In a shocking turn of events, a bomb has gone off in an administrative building in the heart of Neuveo Madrid. At around 9:30 in the morning a loud explosion was hurt from the Neuveo Madrid Oversight Administration, tasked with managing the riled up Thuzi population, in the 3rd floor of the building. The explosion was right outside one of the offices of a security outpost in the building and the break room. Fortunately, the break room was mostly empty since it was still early into the shift inside the building. However, 6 people had been injured in the explosion and 2 of those injured in critical condition. Whilst the break room itself is no more, the rest of the building is fine. The block surrounding the administrative building has been put under strict control for the time being and everyone in the surrounding area evacuated. After a police investigation the police came to the conclusion it was a fertilizer bomb. 7 hours after the explosion a man walked into a police station only 1 block away from the location of the explosion holding and aiming a weapon at officers. He was shot instantly and died shortly of his injuries after the shooting. When the police checked his house the next day they came to the conclusion the shooter, Jésus Picalo, was behind the explosion. He was not politically connected to any party or organisation as far as the police has told the public and it's widely accepted that the attack was an act of lonewolf terrorism. Further police investigation, however, is still going on.

Your Friend Tamara 27-Dec-20 03:21 PM
Transgender Rights and why we Need Them Transgender people. What are they? Why do they exist? How can you know if you are transgender? Transgender people have existed for thousands of years, the oldest known recording of a trans person was from around 9,000 years ago. Transgender people are a natural occurrence, and there is no way to deny this. Transgender people are people whose birth sex does not match their preferred gender. They are born in the wrong body, trapped if you will. This occurs naturally, altho scientists have yet to determine the exact cause, there are many theories. The state of being transgender is attributed to genetics, as it can be passed through a family. Some MRI scans have shown transgender people to have brains more similar to their prefered gender. While we are uncertain about what causes this condition, it is natural and should not be denied. There is no certain way to know if you may be trans. If you want to be feminine or masculine despite your gender, you may be transgender. If you want to fulfill the roles of the opposite sex, you may be transgender. If you feel more comfortable around members of the opposite sex, you may be transgender. While the occurrence of transgender people is a natural part of being human, we reject these people. In this country identifying as transgender is illegal. Why? There is no reason for such a law that suppresses a natural part of humanity. This has had immense consequences for people. In countries with open access to transgender care, the suicide rate is about 47%. Transgender people make up 2% of the population in countries with transgender rights. By keeping these laws, we are effectively sentencing 2% of the population to death. If the suicide rate is 47% in countries open to transgender people, I cannot imagine what it is here. We need new laws allowing these people to live free, we need to be open and compassionate to them. You can help by contacting your local senator.

Sen. James Durham 28-Dec-20 09:18 PM
Captain Mayfeld Shot in the Line of Duty, Durham Pays Respects Today at 9:47 PM Moscow Time, Captain Mayfeld, a highly respected and decorated war hero from the NCP Loyalist Militia, was shot in the line of duty. He was leading a highly trained force of 500 special forces trained by US Green Berets, supporting our noble military against the barbaric rebel forces of the PIP in Jamesville. While moving towards Jamesville, his force of 500 was attacked and beset by a force larger than 5,000. While still under direct fire by numerous machine guns, Mayfeld rallied his troops into an effective fighting force and was able to kill thousands and hold his ground. Sadly, a grenade landed near his position while he was single-handedly tending to 5 of his men. With him missing the terrorists of the PIP overran the force of 500, and they were wiped out in a savage take-no-prisoners execution, in which the rebels killed all wounded they came across. This has already been drawn parallels to other last stands, such as the Alamo. Mayfeld's force held the Communists in place long enough for them to become encircled and be completely crushed. His whereabouts are currently unknown and he is considered MIA. We were able to reach Senator and Colonel Durham for comment: "This comes as a shock to many of us here back in Morisport. We are heavy-hearted at what has occured and wish for his family to be left alone. I know I considered him a friend and a close ally. We hope he is found alive and well for the sake of his wife and children. We also are using all donations sent to the NCP and giving them to the families of the dead. We ask that you pray for them in their time of struggle and give them all you can. I am writing a bill to give them more than just generous private donations. I would also like to note that he has never and should never be considered a war criminal, and anybody doing so is tarnishing a hero's reputation. God bless Mayfeld and all his men." (edited)

He was leading a highly trained force of 500 special forces trained by US Green Berets, supporting our noble military against the barbaric rebel forces of the PIP in Jamesville. Sen. James Durham 02-Jan-21 01:33 AM
Archduke Lightfoot Militia Repurposed As the nation is still recovering from the disastrous insurrection caused by the left-wing terrorists, many bandits have taken to stricken areas in an attempt to loot devastated areas. After serving with dignity in combat versus Stalinists, the Militia has turned towards aiding the people in these areas rife with banditry and communist criminals. Especially in Phill City, the militia has been reaching out to and aiding the police force, chronically understaffed and aided, to aid them in apprehending and preventing these marauders in robbing the poor citizens of these areas. We would like to note that the militia is not armed with more than the weaponry the police are using, and are avoiding using excessive force upon those arrested.

We, as fellow comrades, have now seen the country torn apart before our very eyes, a failed revolution, Infiltration by revisionists and anarchists. This has shown me the Truth, the NLF was old, decrepit, and frail. We clung to notions of past glories, We clung to ideologies that have been tried and failed. I see it as my duty to lead you all to the future, a future unhindered by the past, a future eternal in its struggle against reaction and capitalism. As such, the NLF is gone, a relic to be forgotten, even destroyed, and now, we are L'Escadrons Gauches, the Left Squadrons, the true vanguard of the Future.
Some claim Gracchus has gone off the deep end, others seem to be forever loyal to the crazed senator. The country must now eagerly wait to see what the new Futurist party has in mind.

Sen. James Durham 04-Jan-21 05:26 PM
Senator Durham Makes Inflammatory Speech Outside Mayoral Office in Archduke Today Senator Durham made an incendiary speech about Pro-Thuzi sentiment, real or imagined, in the government. "I stand here today, and draw a line in the dust for all to see, that I will no longer tolerate the subservience to the Thuzi scum to our North. I have seen some of the St. Solomon lobbyists and politicians denigrating our great people of Anglo and Spanish origin in some wish to reform relations with the puppet of a foreign power on our border. To this I say that I will no longer tolerate this. Let us send this message back to St. Solomon: the PATRIAN people of good stock run this nation, not the bankers, nor the lobbyists, nor the foreign powers, and I will not let them for as long as I am in office. And from this day forward, I and the other members of the NCP are standing up to this anti-Patrian sentiment in our nation, and the heel of the Capitol's tyranny does not deserve any place on the neck of a good, upright man! A good Patrian boy does not deserve to be muddied with Pro-Thuzi ideas ruining his mind and corrupting it to hate his people! A Patrian man does not deserve to have to work with a Thuzi at his job! I intend to take the offensive to the Capitol and reverse any legislation that may promote such ideals. To this I say: GOD BLESS PATRIUM, AND MAY THE THUZIS STAY UP NORTH WHERE THEY BELONG!"

This bill harms Patrians, and does nothing to help their security (edited)

Sen. Empharius 05-Jan-21 07:28 PM
The JCDY opens it's doors The recently founded Jamesville Center for DIsplaced Youth has opened today. Founded by the PCP's Senator Empharius it is an orphanage, primarily intended to help those who lost thier families to the war, but also readily aviable to all who are in need of it. Sen. Empharius has said that he intends for life inside to be as utopian as it can be made, with living based apon collectivist ideals, and education student driven and decentralized, with few mandatory courses, and fully discussion based learning, divorced fully from the teachings of old, which were intended to creat subservient workers, not build a love of learning. They are less like traditional schools, and far more student driven and personalized to each unique student. The orphanage shall also provide mental health services, and seek to create the ideal living enviroment for it's residents. As of now it is only moderatly sized, but the senator has hopes of expanding it in the future, to help more childern who lost thier family due to the civil war and the inhumane bombing of Jamesville, as well as to open a daycare wing, and further improve the facility to give the best and most rewarding life it possibly can. Senator Morshu Ferrok 05-Jan-21 10:48 PM
Senator Ludwigson declares new religion! In light of the recent blinding rise of Solarism in Patrium, several other alternative faiths have arisen in Patrium. One of the more successful of these moved under the spotlight when Senator Eric Ludwigson announced that he would be formalizing the belief of "Isekaism" into an official religion. Isekaism, from the Japanese word "isekai", meaning "another world", is the belief that people are reincarnated into or transported to a fantasy world upon their death, with the "isekai" itself being determined by the person's life choices and manner of death. As it has found such success with Senator Ludwigson's popularization of it, he has named himself the so-called "Arch-Peregrinator of the Holy Church of Isekaism". Whether or not this new religion will meet the same success that Solarism has, or if it may even become a mainstream religion, has yet to be seen.

dum idiut 10-Jan-21 05:57 PM
Sol News Today in Roman History, January 10th, 49 BC Gaius Iulius Caesar Crosses the Rubicon River. For 8 years, Iulius Caesar led armies all the way to the Rhine to expand the glory of the Senatus Populusque Romanus, subjugating the barbarians of Gaul from the Alps to Britannia. He expected that for such service rendered to his country, the Senate would welcome him back with open arms. That is not what happened. The corrupt Senate hated Caesar, as they were jealous of how such a perfect specimen would be able to live. They intended to destroy Caesar. The Senate demanded that Caesar return to Rome without an army. Caesar, out of great love and admiration of his people, had to ponder the great question of the day. He did not want to work against an institution so integral to the Roman state as the Senate. However, he also did not want to sit idly by as he watched corrupt oligarchs destroy his country. Thus, he did the only thing such a patriotic soul could do, and with great concern in his heart, he declared Alea Iacta Est, that is, the die is cast, and marched with the 13th legion across the Rubicon, the border between the province under his governorship in Cisalpine-Gaul, and Italy.

BrosPros 10-Jan-21 11:04 PM
Jason Smith talks about the church and the State "It has come to my attention that a recent bill contains full recognition of Solarism by Patriums government, proposed by the ASS party. It's true, Solarism has been under attack by multiple senators and higher authorities, and that's not right, the Libertarian Party affirms that all religions should be able to practiced in Patrium. Having the government give certain rights to certain religions would imply that the government has authority to choose what religion is able to be legally practiced by it's people. The recent rise of religious beliefs in the republic should be looked at as a good thing for its people. Though I would not think it wise to conjoin the church and State, it's best to separate these two institutions. I do sympathize for all religions who face oppression by governments and other established religions, I aim to prevent it. For the time being I must not give my endorsement of the Solarism bill. In fact it has launched me to create legislation to solve this particular problem." (edited)

New Global Stability Rankings The Global Economy website has recently released the 2022 rankings of the stability of all world countries. Patrium has placed 178th on the list, just above Ukraine and just below Venezuela. This is down 11 spots from last year. The 2019 rankings can be found here: https://www.theglobaleconomy.com/rankings/wb_political_stability/ (edited)
Political stability by country, around the world | TheGlobalEconomy...
The average for 2019 based on 195 countries was -0.05 points.The highest value was in Iceland: 1.66 points and the lowest value was in Yemen: -2.77 points. The indicator is available from 1996 to 2019. Below is a chart for all countries where data are available.

Big Brother (Clement2022) 12-Jan-21 06:02 PM
The State of Patrium Big Brother makes a speech "The brave men, women, and drones of Patrium fought blood and soil to defend this nation from an illegal insurrection and not only have they not gotten their due pensions and respect, they are being spit in the face with a bill that cut military spending by over half! The so-called "law and order parties" have signed on to the bill that sells our nation's heart and soul to foreign nations and multinational corporations. I maintain that the Counter-Revolution has its rights; and I may add, so that everyone may know, that I am here to defend and give the greatest value to the Counter-Revolution of the "Black Shirts," inserting it intrinsically in the history of the Nation as an active force in development, progress and the restoration of equilibrium. I could have carried our victory much further, and I refused to do so. I imposed limits upon my action and told myself that the truest wisdom is that which does not forsake one after victory. With 300,000 young men, armed to the teeth, ready for anything and almost mystically prompt to obey any order of mine, I could have punished all those who have slandered and thrown mud at the government of Patrium. I could have made a bivouac of this gloomy grey hall; I could have shut up Parliament and formed a Government exclusively of Loyalists; I could have done so, but I did not wish to do so, at least not at this moment. As far as Jazira is concerned, Patrium believes that the moment has come to face the question of her relations with that country in its present reality; but this apart from their internal conditions, with which we, as a Government, do not wish to interfere, since in our turn we shall admit of no foreign interference in our own domestic affairs. In consequence we are disposed to consider the possibility of a final solution. "

Sen. James Durham 12-Jan-21 06:16 PM
James Durham Makes Another Incendiary Speech With a track record of having speeches that an inflammatory to say the least, James Durham has once again appeared outside of Archduke, this time denigrating the Air Force while venerating the Army, specifically the infantry, of which he used to be an officer in. "When I was in the Army, we were already receiving scraps compared to the Air Force. Yet do you remember who won that war? Was it those in the cockpit, or those brave souls on the ground, fighting to keep our nation free and safe of Thuzi influence? I say this as an officer, yet a coward, one who never saw direct combat, yet nevertheless directed countless numbers to die under his command, attempts to lie and slander about my record on the armed forces. I have NEVER hurt those who fight our wars, and will continue to back those who are the bravest. I was the one who wrote into service the PFL, yet this Senator continues to attempt to slander me on my record. It was I who never put my troops into a hopeless situation, who never attacked trenchlines directly. In fact, the only two major defeats suffered by my forces were at the hands of supposed allies: One by a traitor named Ultrackius, the other at the hands of a military dunce who continues to serve, with blood on their hands, in this very Senate! Believe me, all true militarymen, those who have seen combat and know the hardships, support the very party that is cutting back bloat and needless spending under the guise of the Air Force and Naval budget. Do not fret, though. I will make sure that the Army is fully funded and ready for any would-be invaders or other possible traitors, such as the other Senator implied with his comments that he would commit if he did not get his way. I stay loyal to this nation, to my people, and to my oath as an officer: I will protect this nation and the democracy instilled from our great values we hold dear to my last breath. (edited)

Sen. James Durham 24-Jan-21 11:04 PM
Senator James Durham Makes Commitment On Presidential Candidates Outside Archduke "Now I believe that our great Patrian citizens have a right to fair and good life, and that is why I stand before you today to endorse one candidate, and one candidate only: Mr. Clement of the ALP. While Clement is not of my party, I nevertheless truly believe he has the nation's best interests at heart. He truly does mean the best for this country, whether that be in the facet of defending our great nation, developing it's economy so that every citizen can afford to have a family and work a fulfilling job, or even rooting out corruption at the highest levels in government. I do believe that a great sickness, a malaise, has fallen over this once great nation of ours. Where we were once proud to label ourselves Patrians, and we worked good union jobs to go home to our children and wives at night, we now feel a twinge of shame whenever we hear Patrium or a Patrian in the news. We have allowed our nation not to be destroyed by outsiders, but those closest to the heart of our great democracy: the politicians, greedy internationalists, and a large swath of some of our most highly educated. We do not see ourselves in the great light we once had, and I truly believe that Clement is the greatest man for the noble title of President. Therefore, it is my honor to formally endorse him and pray that every NCP supporter goes to the polls on Election Day, and votes for Clement. Any other vote is a vote against Patrium, against our democracy, against our way of life, against our beliefs and values, and most importantly, against the great people of Patrium's interest!" parm 26-Jan-21 05:14 PM
Vox Populi — Labor Party leadership collapse represents the failings of centralist organization Recently, we've seen a coup of the party's leadership by their Executive, Bahman Dushar, appointing JoeBloggs to the second-in-command position without a consultation of the party members. This has boiled over to a heated dispute within the party, with the Troika, composed of Empharius, Ballistic, and Papa Stalin, refusing to acknowledge the leadership position given by the Executive to JoeBloggs, due to neither a Troika nor party vote being held. Influential Politburo member, Michael Evans, also compounded on the criticism of the Executive decision to appoint JoeBloggs as the second-in-command. For now, the dispute has seemed to calm down slightly, with JoeBloggs demoted to the Troika. In this dispute, we see a fundamental failing of the centralist method used by the Labor Party. A system in which the dominant leadership may impose their doctrine on the party line and even attempt to coup other safeguards on their power. Such a complex organizational structure has led to disagreements and inefficiencies within the party structure while simultaneously excluding the voices of party members. Not all hope is lost for the organization of the communist workers' movement. The People's Liberation Collective-Federation for Solidarity and Liberation (PLC-FSL) has embraced a leaderless structure within the organization. All decisions are made through direct democracy and the consent of all members. Disputes are resolved not through political manipulation but reasoned discussion and consultation with the members and the base of the organization. The nominal Head position, which has no power, rotates among the members every week. So far, the system has engendered cooperation and consensus decision-making over the dysfunctional and undemocratic centralist structure found in the Labor Party.

James Durham Senator James Durham Makes Commitment On Presidential Candidates Outside Archduke "Now I believe that our great Patrian citizens have a right to fair and good life, and that is why I stand before you today to endorse one candidate, and one candidate only: Mr. Clement of the ALP. While Clement is not of my party, I nevertheless truly believe he has the nation's best interests at heart. He truly does mean the best for this country, whether that be in the facet of defending our great nation, developing it's economy so that every citizen can afford to have a family and work a fulfilling job, or even rooting out corruption at the highest levels in government. I do believe that a great sickness, a malaise, has fallen over this once great nation of ours. Where we were once proud to label ourselves Patrians, and we worked good union jobs to go home to our children and wives at night, we now feel a twinge of shame whenever we hear Patrium or a Patrian in the news. We have allowed our nation not to be destroyed by outsiders, but those closest to the heart of our great democracy: the politicians, greedy internationalists, and a large swath of some of our most highly educated. We do not see ourselves in the great light we once had, and I truly believe that Clement is the greatest man for the noble title of President. Therefore, it is my honor to formally endorse him and pray that every NCP supporter goes to the polls on Election Day, and votes for Clement. Any other vote is a vote against Patrium, against our democracy, against our way of life, against our beliefs and values, and most importantly, against the great people of Patrium's interest!" parm 29-Jan-21 04:12 PM
NEW PORTO TIMES Presidential Race Begins to Take Shape
PRESIDENTIAL ELECTION POLLS New Porto Times | 23 April 2022 | Voting Intention | Margin of Error: ±3% | Sample Size: 1500
>
Pierce Clement (Adams' Legacy Party) — 31.0% (+14.3%) Isabella Kline (Patrium Party for Equality — 29.0% (+29.0%) Azhar Babatunde (Peace and Independence Party) — 21.0% (+4.3%) Edgar Sanz (People's Pragmatist Party of Patrium) — 19.0% (+2.3%)
The 2nd Patrian Presidential Election is set to take place in the next few weeks. Out of the 6 initial candidates, 2, Hymn Bleu and Joseph Carr, have dropped out. It is a tight race between ALP nominee Pierce Clement and PPE nominee Isabella Kline, with Azhar Babatunde (PIP) and Edgar Sanz (4P) providing strong 3rd party challenges. Clement is backed mainly by the NCP, ASS, and TPO, while Kline is backed by the left-wing parties. The Libertarian Party breaks ranks with the right-wing coalition by supporting Babatunde, while Sanz has strong centrist support. The analysts here at the New Porto Times predict an incredibly close race between Kline and Clement, with Babatunde functioning as a kingmaker of sorts. We do not expect Sanz to remain in the race nor to spoil the votes of one side significantly. We do not rule out the possibility that Babatunde may absorb support from the voters dissatisfied with both Clement and Kline. Be sure to tune in for our election night broadcast! Pictured: Poll results (edited)

As is known, in recent times, Jaziran immigrants have begun to show up. Under the Refugee Act, they should be safe, however they ARE NOT thanks to AAP. This man has condemned hundreds of Jazirans to handlessness thanks to his vitriolic speech. The Purity Party has put out this statement: "Senator Adolf Augusto Pencenrios is a dangerous man and should not be let into power whatsoever. If any Patrian officials truly believe in humane conduct, they should vote for his removal from the Patrian Senate". Patrian, Thuzi and Selvan senators have unfortunately declined to comment, however sources state that Selvans are quickly radicalizing as well The Green Wolves have gained support. Plan N has begun (edited)
